text: فَمَا ٱسۡطَٰعُوٓاْ أَن يَظۡهَرُوهُ وَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ لَهُۥ نَقۡبٗا
translation: Thus they could not climb over it nor could they pierce it[48].
footnotes: [48] They could not climb the dam for its smooth surface as well as it was as high as the mountains, and could not pierce it for its fortitude.
